EmailTemplate.subject: From SunPower UK - the next steps in your solar project
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Mr/Ms {!Opportunity.Name__c},
Thank you for your interest in SunPower solar panels.
We understand that it is important for you to make the right choice in terms of energy and we are convinced that our photovoltaic panels, the most reliable and the most efficient of the panels available on the market, will meet your needs.
In order to help you with your project and provide a high level of service, SunPower has developed a network of local Partners installers, carefully selected and trained in our technologies. We are very be happy to be able to put you in touch with your local Partner, {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c}
Partner Facts: Firmly established in your area, this Partner has been selected for their professionalism, a high quality of service and expertise in solar energy. We are sure that our Partner will be able to help you to navigate your solar journey and assist you with your project.
IMPORTANT POINTS
• Meet our Partner
Our local Partner {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} will contact you soon within the next 24 hours in order to analyze your needs and then present to you suitable SunPower solar solutions. The company’s {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} representative will also be able to answer any questions you might have concerning your future photovoltaic project.
• Choose a well established company
You should be able to choose a sustainable provider. As an affiliate of Total, SunPower has been one of the leaders in the solar market for over 25 years.
• Choose performance and reliability
Independent tests have proven that SunPower panels are the most efficient on the market. Our panels not only have an exceptional power, but also a life cycle exceeding 40 years.
• Choose local
Apart from our network of local Partners, SunPower has several manufacturing facilities in Europe.
Our Partner {!Opportunity.Partner_Account_text__c} will contact you soon to arrange an appointment. If you wish, you can also contact the company at the following contact details:
{!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} {!Opportunity.Partner_Phone__c}. {!Opportunity.OwnerEmail}
